meanings.sent1: This gum is the chewiest I have ever tried.
meanings.sent2: The taffy was the chewiest treat at the fair.
meanings.sent3: The chewiest candy made my jaw ache from all the chewing.
meanings.sent4: Her determination was as chewiest as a piece of tough steak.
meanings.sent5: The chewiest caramel stuck to my teeth like glue.

meanings.sent1: The stale bread was the chewiest thing I had ever encountered.
meanings.sent2: The tough jerky was the chewiest snack in the bag.
meanings.sent3: Trying to chew the overcooked steak felt like a battle of wills.
meanings.sent4: The situation was as chewiest as a piece of rubber.
meanings.sent5: The old bubblegum was the chewiest substance known to man.
